ctx: Monitor za Car Rear View kamero
content:
Če kupim takšno kamero, kakšen monitor mi priporočate? Na kaj moram biti pozoren pri izbiri monitorja? 
170° Night Vision Waterproof Car Rear View Camera
Image Sensor: CMOS
Power Supply: DC12V
Power: Less than 1W
TV System 
NTSC 
PAL
Effective Pixels: 
580X540 
580X492
Electronic Shutter: 1/60(NTSC)-1/10000 Second 150(PAL)-1/10000 Second
Lux: 0.5Lux
Resolution(TV Lines): 420
Sensing Area(mm): 3.3X2.6
Min.Ilumination(Lua/F1.2) 0
Horizontal Sync.Frequency(KHZ) 15.625
Vertical Sync.Frequency(HZ) 50
Video Output 1.0vp-p, 75 Ohms
Gamma Consumption 0.45
White Balance Auto
AGC Auto
BLC Auto
S/N Ratio: ≥48db
Lens 1.6
Lens Angle(Deg.) 170 degrees
Current Consumption(mA) 68
Power Supply: 12V
Operating Temperature(Deg.C) -20～+70(RH95% Max.)
Storage Temperature(Deg.C) -20～+80(RH95% Max.)
Water-proof function YES
Protection Category: IP66
Night vision function YES
author: steni
